qas.question: What part of the populace does not  identify with conformists religious  majority?

answers.text: 7% of the population identifies as Christian; 4% as Muslim; 1% follows traditional animistic beliefs; and 2% follow other religions

qas.question: Are these percentages an accurate estimate of nonconformists religious  groups ?

answers.text: international religious freedom report, official statistics are alleged to underestimate the non-Buddhist population.

qas.question: How many dwelling are dedicated to the worship of the faith Jehovah's Witnesses ?

answers.text: 80 congregations around the country and a branch office in Yangon

qas.question: How many dialects are the publications distributed by the Jehovah Witness available in ?
What problem presented itself to the Jewish locale in Rangoon ?

answers.text: a synagogue but no resident rabbi to conduct services

context: According to Pew Research, <a0_0>7% of the population identifies as Christian; 4% as Muslim; 1% follows traditional animistic beliefs; and 2% follow other religions<a0_0/>, including Mahayana Buddhism, Hinduism, and East Asian religions. However, according to a US State Department's 2010 <a1_0>international religious freedom report, official statistics are alleged to underestimate the non-Buddhist population.<a1_0/> Independent researchers put the Muslim population at 6 to 10% of the population[citation needed]. Jehovah's Witnesses have been present since 1914 and have about <a2_0>80 congregations around the country and a branch office in Yangon<a2_0/> publishing in <a3_0>16 languages<a3_0/>. A tiny Jewish community in Rangoon had <a4_0>a synagogue but no resident rabbi to conduct services<a4_0/>.
